About Me

My developer journey...

I am a software engineer who specializes in building innovative user interfaces that allow users to forget they are looking at a browser. I do this by prioritizing web performance, creating engaging CSS animations, and focusing on the overall flow of a website from a user's perspective.

I have over 4 years of software engineering experience with a strong expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and technical debugging. I am looking for tech-focused companies that can use my expertise to reach a wide-ranging audience so they can grow and retain their customer base.

I am currently exploring the United States with my wife and kids in a 19-foot travel trailer. In my free time, you can find me hiking/exploring a national/state park and exploring new towns with my family to find the best tourist traps/local food.

Trilogy Education Services

Software Engineer Senior Learning Assistant

Supported developers via Slack/Zoom by leading pair programming sessions, performing code reviews, & debugging code. Provided technical mentoring resulting in a 98.5% satisfaction rating from over 700 developers.

Tech Stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, NPM, Webpack, React.js, MySQL, MongoDB, Git, GraphQL

Hack for LA

Open Source Maintainer

Resolved bugs for the Hack for LA website resulting in system performance and scalability improvements. Revised the onboarding guide for the Hack for LA team, decreasing onboarding time for new developers by 60%.

Tech Stack: Jekyll, HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, Git, Agile, GitHub Actions, Docker

Turnkey Marketing

Full-Stack PHP Developer

Developed Vue.js dashboard application, decreasing report generation for marketing departments by 60%. Oversaw the full lifecycle of software development for a critical PHP application, delivering 12 large product updates.

Tech Stack: PHP, Codeigniter, Vue.js, HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, WordPress, MySQL
